text:
I have yet to see any pharmaceutical company distance themselves from their association's threats about withholding #COVID19 #vaccine from Canadians.🇨🇦💉
"We have concerns about #PMPRB reforms BUT we will NOT use a pandemic as blackmail material" would seem a low #CSR bar, but... https://t.co/BCHyNykldU https://t.co/0WNSQiWu97
